titleStmt.title: The stewards last account Deliuered in fiue sermons vpon the sixteenth chapter of the gospell by Saint Luke, the first and second verses. By Robert Bagnall, Minister of the Word of God, at Hutton in Somersetshire.
titleStmt.author: Bagnall, Robert, b. 1559 or 60.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Purslowe, for Iohn Clarke: and are to be sold at his shop vnder Saint Peters Church in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop vnder Saint Peters Church in Cornhill
